mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alphafrog_strategy_backtest_run (strategy_id, user_id, run_time, start_date, end_date, params_json, status, ext) VALUES (#{strategyId}, #{userId}, #{runTime}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, CAST(#{paramsJson} AS jsonb), #{status}, CAST(#{extJson} AS jsonb))
mapper.select: SELECT id, strategy_id, user_id, run_time, start_date, end_date, params_json::text AS params_json, status, created_at, updated_at, ext::text AS ext_json FROM alphafrog_strategy_backtest_run WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE alphafrog_strategy_backtest_run SET run_time = #{runTime}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, params_json = CAST(#{paramsJson} AS jsonb), status = #{status}, ext = CAST(#{extJson} AS jsonb), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
